summary:
Find a nice deposit of ore,
But left your pickaxe at Home?

Well this is now a problem of the past
Bound PickAxe gives you the ability to summon a pickaxe where ever you may be
descriptionHtml:
Demonstration:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vIBZm-SbqX0

No flashy video containing loud annoying music or a god mode Dova killing lots of bad guys. -.-

Allows you to create a pickaxe,
Just so you don't have to go logging a pickaxe around in you inventory.
You can find the spell book in whiterun's dragonskeep in Farengar Secret-Fire's quarters. [see image]


Notes:
*This is my first mod, I've created it just to see how different the skyrim creation kit is to oblivions,
*The spell creates an actual pickaxe that does no disappear after the time runs out,
*As my experience with skyrims creation kit I hope to create the same effect those bound weapons have...
author: Here57
